mapper.select: select u.id as userId,u.user_name,r.role, q.title,q.content,q.answer_status,qc.question_type from question_tb as q join question_category_tb as qc on q.question_type_id = qc.id join user_tb as u on u.id = q.user_id join role_tb as r on u.role_id = r.id where qc.question_type = #{category} order by q.id desc limit #{begin}, #{range};

select count(*) from question_tb as q join question_category_tb as qc on q.question_type_id = qc.id join user_tb as u on u.id = q.user_id join role_tb as r on u.role_id = r.id where qc.question_type = #{category};

select u.id as userId,u.user_name,r.role, q.title,q.content,q.answer_status,qc.question_type from question_tb as q join question_category_tb as qc on q.question_type_id = qc.id join user_tb as u on u.id = q.user_id join role_tb as r on u.role_id = r.id where q.title like #{searchText} or q.content like #{searchText} order by q.id desc limit #{begin}, #{range};

select count(*) as count from question_tb as q join question_category_tb as qc on q.question_type_id = qc.id join user_tb as u on u.id = q.user_id join role_tb as r on u.role_id = r.id where q.title like #{searchText} or q.content like #{searchText} order by q.id desc
